verses.plain: God be merciful unto us, and bless us; and cause his face to shine upon us; Selah.

tokens.t: God be merciful unto us, and bless us;
cause his face to shine upon us; Selah.

verses.plain: That thy way may be known upon earth, thy saving health among all nations.

tokens.t: That thy way may be known upon earth, thy saving health among all nations.

verses.plain: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.

tokens.t: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.

verses.plain: O let the nations be glad and sing for joy: for thou shalt judge the people righteously, and govern the nations upon earth. Selah.

tokens.t: O let the nations be glad and sing for joy: for thou shalt judge the people righteously, and govern the nations upon earth. Selah.

verses.plain: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.

tokens.t: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.

verses.plain: Then shall the earth yield her increase; and God, even our own God, shall bless us.

tokens.t: shall the earth yield her increase;
our own God, shall bless us.

verses.plain: God shall bless us; and all the ends of the earth shall fear him.

tokens.t: God shall bless us; and all the ends of the earth shall fear him.
